sourcesContent: import _slicedToArray from"@babel/runtime/helpers/slicedToArray";import sha1 from"./sha1";var encodeBase64=function(a){return btoa(a).replace(/=*$/g,"")},getSha1=function(a,b){return sha1(a).slice(0,b)},getSealingParams=function(a,b,c,d){var e=encodeBase64(a),f=getSha1(b+e+c,d);return[f?"ci_seal=".concat(f):"",e?"ci_eqs=".concat(e):""].filter(function(a){return a}).join("&")},getImageSealingParams=function(a,b,c){var d=b||{},e=d.salt,f=d.charCount,g=d.includeParams,h=void 0===g?[]:g,i=!h||0===(null===h||void 0===h?void 0:h.length),j="",k="",l=[],m=[];return a.split("&").forEach(function(a){var b=a.split("="),c=_slicedToArray(b,1),d=c[0];-1<(null===h||void 0===h?void 0:h.indexOf(d))||i?l.push(a):m.push(a)}),0<m.length&&(k=m.join("&")),j=getSealingParams(l.join("&"),c,e,f),[j,k].filter(function(a){return a}).join("&")};export default getImageSealingParams;
